section.p: A harsh wind rips down out of the north, scattering ice crystals like dust on the decks.
‘Yon wind comes off the far mountains,’ says the ship’s carpenter, a widely travelled man. ‘This snow may be from the boughs of the Icicle Woods, or perhaps from the shores of the Rimewater itself.’
He shivers and stamps off below deck to fetch a tot of warm mulled wine.
